name: Iron Sphere
speed: walk 30 ft., burrow 10 ft., climb 20 ft.
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The sphere is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Siege Monster
text: The sphere deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Standing Leap
text: The sphere can launch itself into the air by extending the rods within it like pistons. The sphere's long jump is up to 25 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Tunneler
text: The sphere can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 5-foot-wide, 5-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The iron sphere makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Blade
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Piston
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spike
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Cannon (Recharge 56)
text: The sphere extends a metal rod from one of its many facets and fires a bolt of lightning in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
